name: G. Pet [alpha]
description:
G. Pet is now in development. The free alpha version is available here!

What

A new 3-D virtual pet from a weird, retro world. Every pet is unique and up for one-time adoption. Read the alpha controls & how to play.

Why

Inspired by Tamagotchi, Digimon, Gigapet, Pokemon Pikachu, and the other virtual pets of the 1990s, but rendered in a PlayStation-like style. The successor to S. Pet?

Credits

Lead designer & programmer - Nathan Pasko
That's me. Hi!

Graphics Pipeline - HPSXRP
Fonts - Chevy Ray
Tools - Unity, Blender, PhotoShop
